data.title: Marketing Materials to Promote Your Lash Business
data.meta_description: Grow your Lash Business with Xtreme Lashes Marketing Materials. Entice customers with compelling materials that will leave a lasting impression.
data.text:
MARKETING MATERIALS

Aftercare Guide QR Code Card (25 Pack)

Give your clients the know-how to achieve long-lasting and beautiful eyelash extensions with the Aftercare Guide QR Code. Once the code is scanned, your client will have access to easy-to-follow instructions on how to care for their new Xtreme Lashes® Eyelash Extensions.

Card dimensions are equivalent to the size of a business card.

Back to Top

Retail Affiliate/Referral Reminder Card (25 Pack)

To help you kickstart earning commission as a retail affiliate, you can hand out the Retail Affiliate/Referral Reminder Card to your clients, friends or family members to remind them to use your Retail Affiliate code. Remember, you’ll receive 15% commission, and they will receive 15% of the products they order.

Card dimensions are equivalent to the size of a business card.

Back to Top

Arch Defining Brow Pencil Postcard (25-Pack)

Promote features and benefits of the Arch Defining Brow Pencil with this informational postcard. Perfectly sized to hand out and display next to your Arch Defining Brow Pencil Merchandising & Retailing Package, these postcards effectively educate your clients about this long-lasting, waterproof, sweat-proof, and smudge-proof eyebrow pencil that creates hair-like strokes with Ease, Speed and Precision™.

This dual-sided postcard is 5” x 7” in size.

Back to Top

GlideShadow™ Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Postcard (25 pack)

Advertise the full range of GlideShadow™ Long Lasting Eyeshadow Sticks with this informational postcard. Educate your clients on the world’s first cream-to-powder eyelash extension compatible eyeshadow stick with no powdery fallout on your lashes or buildup along the lash line.

This dual-sided postcard is 5” x 7”.

Back to Top

X90® Eyelash Extension Curvature Postcards (pack of 25)

Display in your lash studio, bring to local events, or mail this postcard to clients to let them know about the dramatic curl, universally flattering fit, and long-wearing power of the X90 Eyelash Extension Curvature. Featuring ultra-high resolution images, this postcard shows how the 90 degree-like silhouette ascends beyond the eyelid and creates base-to-tip lift, length, density, volume, and color. The back of the card shows a 3D model of the X90 Eyelash Extension to illustrate the highly exaggerated 90 degree curl and unique straight base. It also highlights key benefits of choosing this new curvature for their next lash application.

These postcards are 6" x 9" with a glossy finish.

Back to Top

Professional Tri-Fold Brochures (25-pack):

These interactive brochures are designed to generate interest and educate prospective clients about Xtreme Lashes Eyelash Extensions. Place them in your salon or even at your local bridal boutique and gym to further advertise your services. 8.5” x 5.5” in size.

Available designs below. Click on each thumbnail to enlarge.

Bridal Beauty - Spring/Summer

Bridal Beauty

Back to Top

Professional Tabletop Posters (8.5" x 11")

The right-sized for any space! Display these versatile posters on countertops or walls in standard frames or add them to your “look book” of images for clients to flip through while waiting.

Available designs below. Click on thumbnail to enlarge.

Transform Your Eyes - Model 1

Transform Your Eyes

Before & After - Model 1

Before & After - Model 2

Bridal Beauty

Back to Top

Professional Posters (24" x 36")

Market your business to the fullest with these eye-catching posters! These large posters are perfect for framing and can liven up any salon space or even trade show booth.

Available designs below. Click on thumbnail to enlarge.

Professional Posters may be shipped separately via ground service.

Transform Your Eyes - Model 1

Transform Your Eyes

Before & After - Model 1

Before & After - Model 2

Bridal Beauty - Spring/Summer

Bridal Beauty

Back to Top

Faux Mink X-Wrap® Lash Postcards (pack of 25):

These convenient postcards let your customers know about the voluminous, lash doubling look they can achieve with Faux Mink X-Wrap® Lashes. Featuring close up, ultra-high resolution images of the applied lashes, these postcards offer visuals of the dramatic impact of Faux Mink X-Wrap® Lashes from multiple angles. The back of the card utilizes a 3D model to illustrate the superior interlocking "X" shape of the Faux Mink X-Wrap® Lashes, and highlights key benefits of choosing these lashes for their next application.

Choose from two different versions of the postcard to show clients the flattering result of the Faux Mink X-Wrap® Lashes on different models and eye shapes. These postcards are 6" x 9" with a glossy finish.

Model 1

Model 2

Back to Top

Faux Mink X-Wrap® Lash Poster (8.5" x 11"):

Advertise your lash services and the voluminous, lash doubling results your clients can achieve with Faux Mink X-Wrap® Lashes! Featuring TEN close up, ultra-high resolution images of the applied lashes, these posters offer beautiful visuals of Faux Mink X-Wrap® Lashes from multiple angles, as well as a 3D model to illustrate the innovative interlocking "X" shape, and the key benefits of choosing these lashes for their next application.

This dual-sided poster can be displayed in frames, windows, or on countertops. 8.5" x 11" in size.

Back to Top

Lash Densifying™ Liquid Eyeliner Poster

The eye-catching sketch design of the Lash Densifying™ Liquid Eyeliner Poster is sure to promote sales as it is displayed on your mirror, wall, or shelf. This dual-sided poster shows the versatility of the eyeliner and entices your clients to ask more questions and try out the product while at your salon.

Large: 18" x 24" Small: 8.5" x 11"

Back to Top

GlideLiner™ Postcards (25-pack):

Promote the GlideLiner™ Long-Lasting Eye Pencil collection with these glossy double-sided postcards. One side features a classic eyeliner look and the other contains product description and shade swatches. Also ideal for use as in-store signage when placed in the Marketing Literature Easel. 6” x 9”.

Back to Top

Beauty Book (pack of 10):

This gorgeously curated Beauty Book provides your client with an introduction to the entire Xtreme Lashes by Jo Mousselli® consumer product portfolio. The book features large high-definition product images, key benefits of each retail product, and beautiful model visuals. Leverage the Beauty Book as a marketing tool to help boost your retail sales by informing clients about all the high performance products offered by Xtreme Lashes. Measures 8.5" x 5.5".

Includes highlights on all consumer product categories:

About Xtreme Beauty

Color Cosmetics & Kits

Lash Care & Skin Care

Cleansing Tools & Accessories

A “Notes” page to communicate personalized messages, such as your contact information, next appointment date, lash care instructions, or 10-10 promotion code

Jo Mousselli® Beauty Line

Back to Top

Total Eye Repair Serum Brochures (25-pack):

Inform your clients about the benefits of Total Eye Repair Serum with these high-impact brochures. Designed to showcase product information, before and after images, and clinical results, these brochures are key to generating awareness and interest for the product. Also features a mailing panel.

Insider Tip: Provide 1-2 Total Eye Repair Serum sample packettes with every brochure you give away.

Back to Top

Back to Top

CUSTOM MARKETING MATERIALS

When ordering Customizable Marketing Materials, please provide your salon name, phone number, and website in the 'Comments' section of the Shopping Bag page. For Business Cards, please also provide your name, address, and email. No modifications can be made to this template.

Customizable Marketing Materials will ship separately from other items in your order. Please allow 7 to 10 business days for shipping once the digital proof has been approved.

Available designs shown below. Click on thumbnail to enlarge.

Gain access to customized co-branded Xtreme Lashes marketing material (digital assets & print) upon signing the Proprietary Property Agreement (PPA) and meeting insurance requirements. Call Xtreme Lashes Customer Service at 877-244-5274 to learn more.

Customizable Window Cling (18" x24") - Transform Your Eyes: Model 1

Stop traffic and engage lash prospects with these easy-to-use window clings customized with your salon name, phone number, and website. This versatile marketing tool features a static cling backside that self-adheres onto the interior of any window or mirror, making seasonal image changes a breeze.

Back to Top

Back to Top

Customizable Poster (24" x 36") - Transform Your Eyes: Model 1

Market your business to the fullest with these eye-catching posters that advertise your salon name, phone number, and website. These large posters are perfect for framing and can liven up any salon space or even trade show booth.

Back to Top

Customizable Retractable Banner (7' x 2.75') - Transform Your Eyes: Model 1

Take event and in-store marketing to the next level with these high-impact retractable banners that showcase your salon name, phone number, and website. Portable, lightweight, and easy to assemble, these 7ft tall banners are ideal for use at outdoor marketing events, trade shows, or even as a permanent fixture in your salon.

What's included:

Banner artwork

Aluminum base

Top profile bar

Tri-fold aluminum pole

Nylon carrying bag

Back to Top

Customizable Business Cards - Transform Your Eyes: Model 1

Never miss an opportunity to advertise yourself and your business with these stunning and professional business cards. Designed to help you market yourself as a Certified Xtreme Lashes® Lash Stylist, these custom business cards feature your name, salon name, address, phone number, email, and website.

500 Count 1,000 Count

THANK YOU!

This product has been added to your shopping bag.

x

To purchase consumer-grade aftercare and cosmetics as well as certain cleanse, prime, and prep products at wholesale pricing to resell to your clients, we invite you to become an authorized retailer.

If you’re already authorized to resell consumer-grade products, and believe you’ve received this message in error, or, to learn more, contact us at 877-244-5274 or provide your contact info.

You may continue shopping the portfolio of professional applications supplies.
